title: Podcasts I can't seem to live without.
content:

...And you?
author: Jared Benson

comments.content:
Project Runway: Tim Gunn  
The Ricky Gervais Show  
CBC Radio 3 Podcast  
Typeradio!

Typeradio  
Happy Tree Friends  
Russell Brown Show  
Modified Podcast

Tim Gunn has a Podcast?! _"Designers, work it out."_

Hmm, how about some linkage?\*

Mine seem to be mostly music podcasts:  
 [KCRW Morning Becomes Eclectic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107140049/http:/phobos.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/com.apple.jingle.app.store.DirectAction/viewPodcast?id=76016777) (Excellent.) Check out the recent cast with The Elected, featuring what's his name from Rilo Kiley.)  
 [Indiefeed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107140049/http:/phobos.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/com.apple.jingle.app.store.DirectAction/viewPodcast?id=73329961) (short but good)  
 [The Onion Radio News](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107140049/http:/phobos.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/com.apple.jingle.app.store.DirectAction/viewPodcast?id=117718066) (Aural hilarity.)

\* From your iTunes music store, right click the link and "Copy iTunes URL to clipboard."
